channel.title: Computer wont start?
channel.description: i was playing cod4 and suddently it just minimized and avira popped up with a virus... and i only did get the name and it was 3.dk and i was like "wtf" because 3 is a phone company in denmark and then suddently the computer just turned off and i tried to start in safe mood and it just freezes after its finished loading crcdisk.sys and if i run in normal mode it will just freeze when its done loading... anyone?

item.title: Computer wont start?
item.dc:creator: @IP-Drowner IP-Drowner
item.description:
@IP-Drowner wrote:

Hmm. When you boot into Safe Mood and when is pauses, do you notice any lights turn off (e.g Num Pad Light)? If so, just keep pressing that key to turn it back on and then it should load

P.S: If the for that light doesn’t work, try to keep pressing the Num Pad key

Read full topic

item.title: Computer wont start?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

If you can’t fix it in safe mood you probably best off reformatting.

Read full topic

item.title: Computer wont start?
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

by the way 3 is internet and phone company… wtf??

xEnt:

You dont even need it in any mode, pop the cd in, make sure ur bios settings read ur cd/dvd drive befor hdd and follow it from there.

i’ve tried and it doesnt work because the computer wont run it… i cant run it in any mode

Read full topic

item.title: Computer wont start?
item.dc:creator: @Love_To_Panic Love To Panic!
item.description:
@Love_To_Panic wrote:

[quote=“bowserjr2, post:4, topic:221237”]Do you have the instalation cd?
Then you can reinstall.
6000 DKK is 1 277.49 $.[/quote]If he can get it to start in safe mode all he has to do is pop the disc in and re-boot the system. Lucky for some when my pc messed up it didn’t even get to the bios screen

item.title: Computer wont start?
item.dc:creator: @justa_lol justa lol
item.description:
@justa_lol wrote:

how can i reinstall windows when it wont start?

btw i asked for a computer that was 6000 dkr and thats like 1000 usd and well my dad was so stupid that he bought one for 14000 dkr and the other one was xp…

Read full topic

item.title: Computer wont start?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

That you can do is to install Windows on a new partion, and keep all the old files.
Since you have a lots of virus or a big error the best is a clean install of Windows.

Someone with the same problem as you: http://www.neowin.net/forum/index.php?showtopic=607761
You can try to get a solution there, and if you have Vista, get XP its much better.

Read full topic
